common.view

Class AbstractSquareDrawer<T extends AbstractSquare>

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.view.AbstractSquareDrawer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptySquareDrawer, ReleaseSquareDrawer, SquareDrawer

    public abstract class AbstractSquareDrawer<T extends AbstractSquare>
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains functional methods for displaying/drawing AbstractSquares on a graphics object. Different types of squares can have different drawers which change how the square is displayed by overriding methods in this class.
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
